Daily Rooftop Pool Pass
Elevate your visit to Treehouse with a Daily Rooftop Pool Pass. Enjoy your handcrafted cocktail and delicious meal poolside!
Get Your Pass Here
Weekly Lineup
Join us for our amazing weekly lineups happening at Banter!
Saturday Nights from 6-9pm
Saturday vibes! Join us at Banter every Saturday from 6-9pm for an unforgettable night of live music, good company, and great tunes!
Sunday Brunch & Bliss 11am to 3pm
Sunday Funday just got a whole lot better! Join us for Brunch & Bliss every Sunday, featuring live entertainment and a complimentary first mimosa on us! Treat yourself to a morning of delicious eats, great tunes, and ultimate relaxation

Private Events
Slide 1 of 4
Slide 2 of 4
Slide 3 of 4
Slide 4 of 4
hero gallery paused, press to play images slides
Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides
Book an Event
The Canopy West Palm Beach Hotel offers over 8,000 square feet of combined space for private dining and special events in Downtown West Palm Beach. Stylish interiors, fantastic food, and great service meet to create a memorable experience. We feature 7 unique private event spaces such as our rooftop bar, ground floor restaurant, and our beautiful ballroom with four private meeting rooms.
For all inquiries, please fill out the form below or email
Krista.Smith@Hilton.com
and we’ll be in touch soon.
Inquire Now
Banter Restaurant
Banter restaurant features an upscale casual atmosphere that pays compliment to the raw and industrial design elements of new urbanism. The warm-modern design of the restaurant features a massive green wall and banyan vines hanging 13 stories from the ceiling. Patrons will be embraced by the tastes and sounds of the open kitchen for a dining experience like no other.
Click on the image to open a photo gallery of our space.
Capacity:
Breakfast: 72 Seating  | Lunch & Dinner: 95 Seating
Banyan Ballroom
The Banyan Ballroom offers an impressive 3,069 sq. ft. that can host up to 340 guests. Let us guide you in selecting the ideal wedding, meeting, or events package offering customized catering menus, an expert events team offering unmatched service, and stylish backdrops for your special event.
Click on the image to open a photo gallery of our space.
Capacity:
Standing: 340 | Seated: 200
Rooftop Events
This unique private space offers oceanic and city views of downtown West Palm Beach while providing guests an unforgettable experience. This is the perfect event space for receptions, small ceremonies and more!
Click on the image to open a photo gallery of our space.
Inquire Now
Private Events
